"Equus Zebraus": A mythical horse with zebra stripes that possesses the ability to traverse through different dimensions. Its mane and tail are infused with iridescent colors, reflecting the shifting landscapes it encounters. With each step, it leaves behind a trail of glittering stardust, symbolizing its connection to the cosmos.

"Zebro" - A horse with zebra stripes that can transform into a majestic zebra at will. It possesses the wisdom of the savannah and can communicate with other animals through a unique form of sign language. Its stripes change colors depending on its mood, serving as a warning to those who approach it.

"Stellar Stripes": A horse with zebra stripes that has the ability to harness and manipulate stardust. It can create dazzling light displays, summoning stars from the sky to dance across the land. Its mane and tail are woven with fibers of pure stardust, allowing it to channel the celestial energy.

"Shadow Strider": A horse with zebra stripes that can blend into the shadows, becoming nearly invisible. It possesses the ability to navigate through the darkest of places, using its keen senses to detect even the slightest movements. Its stripes seem to shift and change color depending on the surrounding environment.

"Zebralux": A horse with zebra stripes that has the power to control and manipulate light. It can create blindingly bright illusions, making it nearly impossible to distinguish reality from fantasy. Its mane and tail are infused with microscopic crystals that refract light, amplifying its powers.
